text: Fuck dude I hate writing these because of all the backlash I got on my last post asking for ways to kill myself  I ve searched high and low for multiple different pills that would end me  Idk why this shit has to be so difficult  I m so tired of living  I m so tired of having to be awake  And when I sleep it s even worse  Because i have these really vivid nightmares about everything being in shambles in a life where I m the main character and usually at the end I find myself sitting somewhere with a knife in my hand debating killing myself  Whether I should slit my throat  or my wrists  And I m trapped in my dream watching myself contemplate which way I m going to die  I m  laying in my bed right now and all I can think about it how fucking peaceful I would feel if I wasn t here anymore  If I was just   nonexistent  No brain function  No nothing  I wouldn t sleep and have nightmares  I wouldn t have to be awake and live a nightmare  I just wish for death so bad  It s all I want out of life anymore  Do any of you ever feel like this  Like there s literally nothing else you wish to do but die  Like everything would be solved if you could just go to sleep and your brain stop working for the rest of forever  I can t even properly explain the feeling  I wish you could all step inside my brain and feel what I m feeling for a second so I didn t feel like I had to find the words to make people really understand the utter dread and desire of death that I feel  Words could never do the way I feel justice  I just want it all to end  It s just all I want you guys

text: A living ghost I don t know if I would quite call myself suicidal  I don t want to live  let s put it that way  I hate my life  and I can t get over my immense depression  I ve even gone as far as begging friends to end my life for me  They thought I was joking  I ve never made it to an actual attempt  but I ve gotten damn close  I m seeing a counselor  but since I m in school I can only see her every three weeks or more  I turned   recently and for a couple of days I felt amazing  It slowly faded  today I was mostly content  but right now all I can think about is ending everything and getting this bullshit life over with  I already know that none of my dreams will ever come true  Please don t try to tell me that  You never know  or anything like that  I know  for a fact  that my dreams don t have any chance of coming to fruition  At this point I only keep a hold on those dreams so I can tell people something to make them believe that I m normal  I don t find it fair to force my problems on others  which is why I ve kept most of the details to myself I feel like my life is a really bad movie that you paid a lot to see  You really want to leave  but there s still that feeling that you don t want to waste the money you spent on your ticket  I m getting to a point where that tickets price is lower than the price I m paying inside to watch this movie  It s killing me  and I don t even feel human anymore While talking to a friend I described it as feeling nothing for anything  Nothing makes me happy  I despise all that I once loved  I m still alive  but my true self killed itself long ago  I m a living ghost I m sorry if this post has wasted your time  I understand completely  In reality I just want someone to ask me if I m okay with true meaning behind it  I m sorry
summary: Suicide is not an option for him. He is depressed and wants to end his life. He's seeing a counselor, but he can only see her every 3 weeks or more. He doesn't want to tell people about his problems, he doesn't find it fair to force his problems on others.
cleaned: suicide not option depressed want end life see counselor week not want tell people problem not find fair force problem

text: It is taking all my will to keep myself from killing myselfI have been going through depression for over   years now and is started when I went to university to become a doctor  I spent months alone in my apartment  started skipping class  and eventually dropped out  The only thing that stopped me from ending my life at that time was watching YouTube videos of my favorite YouTuber  I decided that I will do everything in my will in order to be able to someday possibly work with him  My channel has gotten nowhere and I am starting to feel the desperation coming back  It makes my happy when I entertain people but I hardly have an audience to entertain  A few nights ago all I could picture was hanging myself over the staircase and just ending it there  I spent the entire night crying and shaking because I was so close to doing it  The one source of happiness that I know will bring me joy is impossible to get to and I don t know if I can do it anymore  I can t stand this pain

text: It s frustrating living like thisI have Body Dysmorphic Disorder  which has led to anxiety  depression  and an eating disorder  I have been waiting weeks for responses from my doctors  it takes so long for them to process things The lack of treatment has gotten me down  My lack of friends adds to that  My mum doesn t seem to think physiological illnesses are so serious  but then again I just force a smile when I m around people who I know wouldn t understand  so she just thinks I m  better I can t go out without feeling absolutely shitty about myself  One look in a reflection is all it takes  I come home and just want to end it all because its so painfully frustrating that I can t live a normal life like  it seems  everyone else around me  Lots of friends  no major inhibitions  I m only   years old Sometimes I feel fine  the next day  even hour I feel like shit  The other thoughts I have are of hard drug use to fix this awful feeling of depression  but it s mostly suicide What makes everything worse is the loneliness  I m just sitting here starving myself making plans of suicide  I seem to have a very strong willpower  but It s getting weaker as the days without treatment pass   I really need someone to talk to  Anyone else have anything similar
summary: I have Body Dysmorphic Disorder which has led to anxiety depression and an eating disorder. I have been waiting weeks for responses from my doctors. The lack of treatment has gotten me down. My lack of friends adds to that. My mum doesn't think physiological illnesses are so serious.
